short_description: Generates detailed prompts for AI art creation based on conceptual inputs.
description: This pattern transforms conceptual ideas into vivid, detailed prompts for AI art generation. It analyzes the input concept, visualizes it creatively, and produces a comprehensive description along with specific instructions for AI art creation, including style references and emotional impact.
usage_example: echo 'The future of sustainable urban living' | fabric -p create_art_prompt
